com.vungle.publisher

Enum Orientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Orientation>
      • com.vungle.publisher.Orientation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Orientation>

    public enum Orientation
extends java.lang.Enum<Orientation>
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Enum to specify the desired orientation for FullScreenAdActivity.
    See Also:
    AdConfig.setOrientation(Orientation), VunglePub.playAd(AdConfig), VunglePub.getGlobalAdConfig()
